rukus.text: Hai ureueng mukmin meunyo ka geubang 4 Geuyue seumbahyang jak laju bagah F Uroe Jumeuʻat geuhoi seumbahyang Beudoh jak rijang taseubot Allah Keubah meuneukat bek le bloe peubloe Tapubuet meunoe nyang got that leupah Sangkira gata bandum tateupue

Meu ka seuleusoe tapujoe Allah Meu ka seuleusoe pubuet seumbahyang Lam bumoe Tuhan tajak le bagah Beudoh jak mita karonya Tuhan Bek segan-segan taingat Allah Beu le taingat Allah Taʻala Mangat bahgia gata jroh leupah

Watee jikalon barang meuneukat Keunan jikarat jiplueng dum bagah Atawa maen buet sia-sia Jitinggai gata sinan jikeubah Jikeubah gata tadong di sinan Takheun bak Tuhan na nyang jroh leupah Leubeh jroh nibak maen ngon meukat Raseuki meuhat Neubri le Allah Tuhan sineujroh nyang bri raseuki Laen barangri leumoh that leupah
